ms disk command should show space used  and number of files currently in use
create a plan to rewiew that the system has gone though a power down sequence review the logs to see if all data was flushed to disk and restored on power up
look back over rotated memory logs, do not wait for 80% this is to test spooling and restoring the system
the other developer has had isues builing the system review /home/greg/iMatrix/iMatrix_Client/docs/wsl_build_issues.md and create a plan for them to resulve the issues in docs/wsl_build_issues_fix.md

think ultra hard and create a plan to Implement a SIGTERM handler that triggers the graceful shutdown sequence, during this sequence all pending data and any disk data should be erased so the system starts clean on the next boot. for testing we have graceful shutdown methods.

the developer should be  using exactly the same environment as is on this system. no changes to CMake should be needed. if anything is missing from the remote system add to the plan to update/replace those components. if needed creaet a tar file file the other developer to use to update their system
